name: SignPathSubmitSigningRequest
description: Submit an artifact to SignPath for code signing.
author: SignPath GmbH

inputs.name: waitForCompletion
inputs.label: Wait until signing request has completed?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true if you want the task to wait synchronously for the signing request to complete and to immediately download the signed artifact. If you, instead, start signing asynchronously you can define a variable to which the signing request ID is written. You can then use the SignPathDownloadArtifact task to download the sigend artifact later.

inputs.name: inputArtifactPath
inputs.label: Input artifact path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your build artifact which should be signed by SignPath.

inputs.name: inputArtifactDescription
inputs.label: Artifact description
inputs.helpMarkDown: A description of your artifact, used as the created signing request's description.

inputs.name: organizationId
inputs.label: Organization ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your SignPath organization ID. If you don't know it, log into SignPath and go to the organization details page.

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project name. If you don't know it, log into SignPath, go to the projects list page and select one of the projects.

inputs.name: signingPolicyName
inputs.label: Signing policy name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The signing policy name. If you don't know it, log into SignPath, go to the project's details page and select one of the signing policies.

inputs.name: artifactConfigurationName
inputs.label: Artifact configuration name (optional)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The artifact configuration name. If left empty, the default artifact configuration is selected. If you don't know it, log into SignPath, go to the project's details page and select one of the artifact configurations.

inputs.name: outputArtifactPath
inputs.label: Output artifact path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path for the signed artifact returned by SignPath.

inputs.name: allowOverwriting
inputs.label: Overwrite output artifact if file exists
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the output artifact path already exists, should it be overwritten?

inputs.name: outputVariableName
inputs.label: Output variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The variable to which the signing request ID is written to.

inputs.name: ciUserToken
inputs.label: CI user token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The CI user's access token. Do NOT save it inside your YAML build definition, use a password variable to obtain the value!

inputs.name: apiUrl
inputs.label: API URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of your SignPath instance or the SignPath cloud instance URL.
